feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS6][Dedicated Servers] - Rack T06C17 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 2, 09:00 - 11:00 UTC

Mar 6, 23:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on the specified rack.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 02/04/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 02/04/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, public and vRack network will be temporarily unavailable for servers located in rack T06C17.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [LIM][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 25, 05:30 - 07:30 UTC

Mar 13, 16:58 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 25/03/2025 05:30 UTC
End time : 25/03/2025 07:30 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

entry.title: [RBX3][Bare Metal Cloud] - Racks 42A 42B 42C incident notification
entry.content:
Mar 17, 13:34 UTC
Identified - We have identified the origin of the incident affecting our Bare Metal Cloud offer in the racks 42A, 42B and 42C.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 17/03/2025 12:25 UTC
Impacted Service : Some servers in racks 42A, 42B and 42C are temporary unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporary unable to access and use some servers located in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by ongoing operations on this maintenance: https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/2pdqc9d664pp.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 12/03/2025 18:15 UTC
End time : 12/03/2025 21:25 UTC

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

The network traffic has returned to a nominal condition.

We thank you for your patience during the course of this incident.

Here are some supplementary details :

Customers Impact : Clients wishing to authenticate on the VPS service are temporarily unavailable
Root Cause : This incident is related to : https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/9myc4g6tfvlb
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
